name: AppChan2
description: While this should still work, I'm not actively updating it anymore. If you'd like to continue to use Appchan, consider using Appchan X, which you can find out about here: http://zixaphir.github.com/appchan-x/ . New features include Opera and Chrome support, along with a bevvy of features made possible by Javascript.
additional_info:
Should work perfectly in Firefox with the various versions of 4chan x. Please report anything that is broken.

Chrome and Opera support may come back if I can find someone to maintain them, or I find the time and willpower to do so
